title: Xi Tells Biden China Didn’t Want Ukraine Invasion
itunes:title: Xi Tells Biden China Didn’t Want Ukraine Invasion
description:
Bloomberg Political News Director Jodi Schneider reports on President Biden's phone call with Chinese President Xi on Friday about Russia’s war in Ukraine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Labor Reporter Josh Eidelson discuss Josh's Businessweek Magazine story Most U.S. Workers Can Be Fired for Being Fat. Reforms Are Coming. Solidus VP of Regulatory Affairs Kathy Kraninger shares her thoughts on U.S. cryptocurrency regulation. And we Drive to the Close with George Young, Portfolio Manager at Villere Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
